description.en: This dynamic sequence focuses on balance, concentration and core strength for practitioners with some yoga experience. Challenge your stability through a series of standing and balancing poses that will help you develop greater body awareness and mental focus.
description.zh: 这个动态序列专注于平衡、专注力和核心力量，适合有一定瑜伽经验的练习者。通过一系列站立和平衡姿势挑战你的稳定性，帮助你发展更强的身体意识和精神专注力。

instructions.en: Stand tall, engage all four corners of feet, lift through crown of head.
instructions.zh: 挺身站立，四个脚角均匀用力，头顶向上延伸。

transitionHint.en: Begin with a strong foundation, find your center and establish stability before moving into challenging positions.
transitionHint.zh: 从强大的基础开始，找到你的中心，在进入具有挑战性的姿势前建立稳定性。

instructions.en: Shift weight to one foot, place other foot on inner thigh, bring hands to heart or overhead.
instructions.zh: 重心移至一只脚，另一只脚放在大腿内侧，双手合十于胸前或上举。

transitionHint.en: From Mountain Pose, slowly shift your weight to one foot and find a steady gaze point before lifting the other foot.
transitionHint.zh: 从山式，慢慢将重心移至一只脚，在抬起另一只脚之前找到稳定的注视点。

instructions.en: Balance on one leg, hinge at hips, extend other leg back, arms forward or alongside body.
instructions.zh: 单腿平衡，髋部铰链，另一条腿向后伸展，手臂向前或身体两侧。

transitionHint.en: From Tree Pose, transition back to Mountain, then hinge forward from your hips as you extend one leg back.
transitionHint.zh: 从树式，过渡回到山式，然后从髋部前折，同时将一条腿向后伸展。

instructions.en: Balance on one hand and foot, extend other leg parallel to floor, top arm reaches up.
instructions.zh: 在一只手和一只脚上平衡，另一条腿与地板平行伸展，上臂向上伸展。

transitionHint.en: From Warrior III, place your hand on the floor or a block, open your hip and chest to the side as you extend your top arm upward.
transitionHint.zh: 从战士三式，将手放在地板或瑜伽砖上，打开髋部和胸部向侧面，同时将上臂向上伸展。

instructions.en: Balance on one leg, bend opposite knee and hold foot with same-side hand, extend free arm forward.
instructions.zh: 单腿平衡，弯曲对侧膝盖并用同侧手握住脚，自由手臂向前伸展。

transitionHint.en: Return to Mountain Pose, then shift weight to one foot as you bend the opposite knee and reach back for your foot.
transitionHint.zh: 回到山式，然后将重心移至一只脚，同时弯曲对侧膝盖并向后伸手握住脚。

instructions.en: Cross one thigh over the other, wrap arms, sink hips slightly and find balance.
instructions.zh: 一条大腿交叉在另一条上，缠绕手臂，髋部略微下沉并找到平衡。

transitionHint.en: Return to Mountain Pose, then cross one thigh over the other as you wrap the same-side arm under the opposite arm.
transitionHint.zh: 回到山式，然后将一条大腿交叉在另一条上，同时将同侧手臂缠绕在另一侧手臂下方。

instructions.en: Balance on one hand and the edge of one foot, stack feet, extend top arm upward.
instructions.zh: 在一只手和一只脚边缘平衡，双脚堆叠，上臂向上伸展。

transitionHint.en: From a regular plank position, roll onto the outer edge of one foot, stacking feet and lifting your top arm.
transitionHint.zh: 从常规平板支撑位置，滚动到一只脚的外缘，堆叠双脚并抬起上臂。

instructions.en: Balance on sitting bones, lift legs to create a V-shape with body, arms parallel to floor.
instructions.zh: 在坐骨上平衡，抬起双腿与身体形成V形，手臂平行于地面。

transitionHint.en: Come to a seated position, engage your core as you lean back slightly and lift your legs.
transitionHint.zh: 来到坐姿，收紧核心，同时轻微向后倾斜并抬起双腿。

instructions.en: Lie flat on your back, arms at sides, palms up, and completely relax.
instructions.zh: 平躺，手臂放在身体两侧，掌心向上，完全放松。

transitionHint.en: Release all effort and surrender to gravity, allowing your body to absorb the benefits of your balance practice.
transitionHint.zh: 释放所有努力，屈服于重力，让你的身体吸收平衡练习的益处。

benefits.zh: 发展高级平衡能力和协调性

benefits.en: Strengthens stabilizing muscles throughout the body

benefits.zh: 提高精神专注力和集中力
